sourcesContent:
function Sidebar({notes,onAddNote,onNoteSelect,activeNote,setActiveNote}){ return(

Notes

+

{notes.map((note)=> (
setActiveNote(note.id)}>
{note.title}
{new Date(note.dateCreated).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric", hour: "numeric", minute: "numeric", hour12: true })}

{note.body&& note.body.substr(0,100)+"..."}

))} {/*
TITLE
Date

Note Preview

*/}
); } export default Sidebar;
